name: Marco
text:
[Once Per Turn] If this Character would be K.O'd by your opponents effects, you may instead trash 1 card from your hand.
[When Attacking] Reveal the top card of your deck. If it has "Whitebeard Pirates" in its types, give this Character +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn
